00033 SEXP LU_expand(SEXP x)
00034 {
00035     char *nms[] = {"L", "U", "P", ""};
00036     SEXP L, U, P, val = PROTECT(Matrix_make_named(VECSXP, nms)),
00037         lux = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym),
00038         dd = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym);
00039     int *iperm, *perm, *pivot = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_permSym)),
00040         i, n = INTEGER(dd)[0];
00041 
00042     SET_VECTOR_ELT(val, 0, NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dtrMatrix")));
00043     L = VECTOR_ELT(val, 0);
00044     SET_VECTOR_ELT(val, 1, NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dtrMatrix")));
00045     U = VECTOR_ELT(val, 1);
00046     SET_VECTOR_ELT(val, 2, NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("pMatrix")));
00047     P = VECTOR_ELT(val, 2);
00048     SET_SLOT(L, Matrix_xSym, duplicate(lux));
00049     SET_SLOT(L, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dd));
00050     SET_SLOT(L, Matrix_uploSym, mkString("L"));
00051     SET_SLOT(L, Matrix_diagSym, mkString("U"));
00052     make_d_matrix_triangular(REAL(GET_SLOT(L, Matrix_xSym)), L);
00053     SET_SLOT(U, Matrix_xSym, duplicate(lux));
00054     SET_SLOT(U, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dd));
00055     SET_SLOT(U, Matrix_uploSym, mkString("U"));
00056     SET_SLOT(U, Matrix_diagSym, mkString("N"));
00057     make_d_matrix_triangular(REAL(GET_SLOT(U, Matrix_xSym)), U);
00058     SET_SLOT(P, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dd));
00059     iperm = Alloca(n, int);
00060     R_CheckStack();
00061     perm = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(P, Matrix_permSym, INTSXP, n));
00062 
00063     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) iperm[i] = i + 1; /* initialize permutation*/
00064     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {   /* generate inverse permutation */
00065         int newpos = pivot[i] - 1;
00066         if (newpos != i) {
00067             int tmp = iperm[i];
00068 
00069             iperm[i] = iperm[newpos];
00070             iperm[newpos] = tmp;
00071         }
00072     }
00073                                 /* invert the inverse */
00074     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) perm[iperm[i] - 1] = i + 1;
00075     UNPROTECT(1);
00076     return val;
00077 }
